## PaginatorBuilderOptions.type property

Pagination display style (required).

**Signature:**

```typescript
type: 'dots' | 'arabic';
```

## Remarks

- `'dots'`<!-- -->: Renders dots representing each page (e.g., '• ○ ○') - `'arabic'`<!-- -->: Renders page numbers (e.g., '2/5')
